alert.note: Alert for Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:14PM EDT until June 21 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 513 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Blountstown to near Stonemill Creek, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Orange, Telogia, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Leon Sinks, Vilas, Arran, Jensen Place, Hilliardville, Central City, Tully, Red Hill, Clio, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Estiffanulga, Wilma, Lewis and Woods. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
